title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, no results are found.
OB: No search results are returned when searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog.
EB: The search should return relevant results when searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a package to search within.
3. Use the search function to search for a declaration.

Expected behavior:
- The search should return relevant results for the declaration search.

Additional notes:
- The context menu in the packages view does successfully return search results for declarations.
